anya-e0608n0:29: Paramaṃ maṅgalaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.13.
anya-e0608n0:35: Gihī sahāyako sāmī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.16.
anya-e0608n0:46: Mahāvattā pavattā ca, atthassa ninnetā pabhū;
anya-e0608n0:47: Amatassa dātā viññū, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.22.
anya-e0608n0:48: Divā tapati ādicco, rattiṃ dippati candimā;
anya-e0608n0:49: Rattiṃdivaṃ tapi nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.23.
anya-e0608n0:50: Sannaddho khattiyo tapati, jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇo;
anya-e0608n0:51: Nirantaraṃ tapi nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.24.
anya-e0608n0:79: Natthi etādiso guru, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.38.
anya-e0608n0:167: Ādicco viya dīpesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.82.
anya-e0608n0:175: Dukkhato bahū mocesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.86.
anya-e0608n0:189: Mānaṃ māyañca maddesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.93.
anya-e0608n0:209: Sabbassa cāgī virāgī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.103.
anya-e0608n0:251: Jino ajini pāpimaṃ, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.124.
anya-e0608n0:285: Sabbesaṃ sabbaṃ bodhesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.141.
anya-e0608n0:309: Bahuṃ iddhiṃ anuppatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.153.
anya-e0608n0:319: Paramaṃ sukhaṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.158.
anya-e0608n0:327: Vedagū ca vedantagū, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.162.
anya-e0608n0:343: Santataṃ samaṇo sāmī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.170.
anya-e0608n0:424: Nirāgo cāpi nikkopo, nicchuddho cāpi nimmado;
anya-e0608n0:425: Niddukkho cāpi nissoko, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.211.
anya-e0608n0:449: Niccapalo ca nillolo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.223.
anya-e0608n0:671: Dhāresi antimaṃ dehaṃ, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.334.
anya-e0608n0:675: Sabbathā mutto subhaddo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.336.
anya-e0608n0:729: Sabbattha saṃvuto sāmī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.363.
anya-e0608n0:775: Patto sabbaññutaṃ ñāṇaṃ, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.386.
anya-e0608n0:777: Paramaṃ sukhaṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.387.
anya-e0608n0:805: Sududdasaṃ sivaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.401.
anya-e0608n0:817: Paramaṃ avayaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.407.
anya-e0608n0:843: Pūjanaṃ thomanaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.420.
anya-e0608n0:856: Sukhassa kovido cāpi, dukkhassa cāpi kovido;
anya-e0608n0:867: Sabbaso bhavaṃ bhañjesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.432.
anya-e0608n0:879: Loke ālokaṃ jotesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.438.
anya-e0608n0:915: Sabbathā akkhayaṃ patto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.456.
anya-e0608n0:925: Sabbadhi sumano santo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.461.
anya-e0608n0:928: Tīrassa kovido cāpi, pārassa cāpi kovido;
anya-e0608n0:929: Ghoraṃ oghaṃ pāraṅgato, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.463.
anya-e0608n0:931: Sabbathā sabbaṃ bodhesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.464.
anya-e0608n0:932: Yogassa kovido cāpi, khemassa cāpi kovido;
anya-e0608n0:993: Paraṃ sukhaṃ adhippatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.495.
anya-e0608n0:1132: Ākāso viya paññāya, alitto anilo yathā;
anya-e0608n0:1133: Anissito vihāsi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.565.
anya-e0608n0:1139: Assāsesi yathā cando, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.568.
anya-e0608n0:1141: Abhīruko yo acchambhī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.569.
anya-e0608n0:1168: Asaṅgacitto akleso, āsā yassa na vijjati;
anya-e0608n0:1173: Anupādā vimutto yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.585.
anya-e0608n0:1177: Appaneho ca appiho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.587.
anya-e0608n0:1201: Akukkucco ca akaṅkhī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.599.
anya-e0608n0:1250: Dhammiṭṭho cāpi dhammaṭṭho, paññiṭṭho cāpi paññaṭṭho;
anya-e0608n0:1251: Suddhiṭṭho cāpi suddhaṭṭho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.624.
anya-e0608n0:1271: Asamo yo asadiso, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.634.
anya-e0608n0:1335: Sabbattha vimalo suddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.666.
anya-e0608n0:1341: Sabbapāpaṃ pahāsi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.669.
anya-e0608n0:1355: Sabbato bhaddaṃ dassāvī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.676.
anya-e0608n0:1357: Sabbesu ca nirākaṅkho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.677.
anya-e0608n0:1359: Nillobho api nillolo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.678.
anya-e0608n0:1361: Nippapañco ca nicchalo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.679.
anya-e0608n0:1369: Sabbataṇhā pahāsi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.683.
anya-e0608n0:1411: Paññakkho cāpi medhakkho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.704.
anya-e0608n0:1429: Dhammiṃ dhammaṃ vitthāresi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.713.
anya-e0608n0:1443: Dassesi amataṃ dhammaṃ, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.720.
anya-e0608n0:1551: Sabbaṃ sammā abhaññāsi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.774.
anya-e0608n0:1581: Sabbattha saṃvuto sūro, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.789.
anya-e0608n0:1599: Subhago sabbathā suddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.798.
anya-e0608n0:1621: Yo amatapphalaṃ patto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.809.
anya-e0608n0:1623: Paramaṃ sivaṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.810.
anya-e0608n0:1625: Puṇṇindu viya sampuṇṇo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.811.
anya-e0608n0:1637: Nibbānaṃ yo sacchikato, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.817.
anya-e0608n0:1639: Sabbattha samako sāmī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.818.
anya-e0608n0:1649: Sabbāsave pahāsi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.823.
anya-e0608n0:1656: Yo na limpati kāmesu, āraggeriva sāsapo;
anya-e0608n0:1663: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.830.
anya-e0608n0:1665: Bahū satte pamocesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.831.
anya-e0608n0:1675: Brāhmaṇo samaṇo sādhu, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.836.
anya-e0608n0:1682: Yassa māyā ca māno ca, moho makkho ca pātito;
anya-e0608n0:1685: Asatto sugato nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.841.
anya-e0608n0:1690: Tapassī cāpi tejassī, yasassī ca yasodharo;
anya-e0608n0:1691: Vipassī cāpi vidassī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.844.
anya-e0608n0:1693: Mahāmuni mahesī ca, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.845.
anya-e0608n0:1721: Paramaṃ padaṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.859.
anya-e0608n0:1735: Asatto sugato suddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.866.
anya-e0608n0:1746: Tejassī ca tejadhano, tapassī ca tapodhano;
anya-e0608n0:1747: Ñāṇesī ca ñāṇadhano, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.872.
anya-e0608n0:1757: Sabbā kaṅkhā vinodesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.877.
anya-e0608n0:1758: Sabbā kaṅkhāyo vāpesi, ātāpī jhāyī brāhmaṇo;
anya-e0608n0:1759: Paccayānaṃ khayaṃ vidvā, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.878.
anya-e0608n0:1783: Sabbavidhe yato yati, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.890.
anya-e0608n0:1789: Accutaṃ akataṃ patto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.893.
anya-e0608n0:1791: Buddho bodhiṃ pakāsesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.894.
anya-e0608n0:1792: Paṇīto ca punīto ca, pavitto cāpi pāvano;
anya-e0608n0:1793: Pesalo pavaro mejjho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.895.
anya-e0608n0:1819: Bhavasotaṃ tiṇṇo nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.908.
anya-e0608n0:1831: Janānaṃ nandako bhiyyo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.914.
anya-e0608n0:1833: Kāmāsavaṃ pajahi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.915.
anya-e0608n0:1843: Nirodhaṃ sakkhiṃ akāsi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.920.
anya-e0608n0:1847: Sabbuttamaṃ dhammaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.922.
anya-e0608n0:1852: Sabbamohanisā hantvā, sabbaṃ rāgaṃ dosaṃ nudo;
anya-e0608n0:1897: Sabbadhi sumutto santo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.947.
anya-e0608n0:1915: Sabbe vattesi sabbaso, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.956.
anya-e0608n0:1936: Sabbattha kusalo satthā, sabbattha kovido vidū;
anya-e0608n0:1937: Sabbattha vimalo suddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.967.
anya-e0608n0:1963: Sabbaṃ sotthiṃ sacchikato, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.980.
anya-e0608n0:1977: Sabbā icchā ucchedesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.987.
anya-e0608n0:2087: Obhāsesi disā sabbā, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1042.
anya-e0608n0:2203: Suddhaṃ saddhammaṃ dīpesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1100.
anya-e0608n0:2207: Santataṃ santiṃ pasāresi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1102.
anya-e0608n0:2222: Bahū bhavoghā tāresi, sudakkho nāviko yathā;
anya-e0608n0:2237: Kalyāṇaṃ dhammaṃ desesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1117.
anya-e0608n0:2285: Sumukho sundaro eso, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1141.
anya-e0608n0:2333: Bhassaro bhāsuro bhiyyo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1165.
anya-e0608n0:2347: Pasiddho vissuto pujjo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1172.
anya-e0608n0:2373: Sabbesaṃ seṭṭho dhammaṭṭho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1185.
anya-e0608n0:2389: Yathābhūtaṃ vipassī ca, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1193.
anya-e0608n0:2392: Sīlañca samādhiṃ patto, patto paññaṃ niyyānikaṃ;
anya-e0608n0:2411: Dhuvaṃ sassataṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1204.
anya-e0608n0:2412: Buddhimā mutimā ceva, matimā ca matissaro;
anya-e0608n0:2431: Nikkāmo nimmalo nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1214.
anya-e0608n0:2432: Moneyyaseṭṭho munindo, ratiṃ ca aratiṃ cuto;
anya-e0608n0:2443: Uddharesi bahū satte, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1220.
anya-e0608n0:2446: Dhañño nātho! Dhañño sāmī! Dhañño mārābhibhū munī!
anya-e0608n0:2449: Aho! Aho! Pāraṅgato, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1223.
anya-e0608n0:2452: Aho! Buddho! Aho! Suddho! Aho! Saṃsuddhamānaso!
anya-e0608n0:2453: Aho! Aho! Mettāsindhu! Buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1225.
